Blog.post: I just wanted to let you guys know that if you are looking into buying clothes or parts for you motorcycle, i recomend that you go to C.O.D., which is located right next to Anntonio's Pizza. I just recently got a $25.00 and a $50.00 C.O.D. gift certificate from my brothers and bought a black Renthal Fatbar, and a 7/8 inch to 1 1/8 inch bar clamp. When we went to the counter to buy them, it came out to about $122.00. Then i gave him the gift certficates and he also added a 10% discount! So everything came out to about $43.00! This place was awsome, and the guy that works there was VERY helpful. If you have any questions about C.O.D. you can e-mail me at martymeraz12@msn.com

I just found this on a forum that i look at.......this guys girlfriend is so messed up! Im in a VERY ****ING bad mood! i was shopping today with my friend and my girl firend and we took a lunch break at a small cafe for some sandwitches. we was eating and my girl friend went to the toilat. She was in there for a good 10 mins then me and my friend desided to go to the toilat and by the time we get back she will be there. But as i walked into the MEN'S toilat i could hear a girl making noises like she was out of breath it was in a locked toilat so i took a look over and guess what? its my girl friend with some little 11 year old wanker and shes kissing him and he had his little no pubes willy out ready to put it in my girls vigina and i shouted like WTF??? and she look up and saw me and was like the most ****ing shocked person in the world, me and my friend was kicking the ****ing door untill it broke open and my friend ran in there and was kicking the **** out of the little boy, then i punched the boy in the face and swang him out of the toilat and stuffed my fist in his ****ing ugly face and left him there and then i said to my EX girl friend "your just a ****ing slag" and then walked out in a BIG trantrum and went home to take a break.now im the most ****ing deppressed guy in the world, i loved that girl she was lovly but i dident know what she was really like and now it feels like someones put his hand inside my stomach and pulling all my insides out. Love Hurts Im going to doctor tomrow be for i kill my self. i need some anti depressent pills

After riding my bike at Biggums for 4 hours.........damn i'm tired! Also I would like to tell you about my day......First I woke up at about 9:00 and ate some Applejack's, then I played MX Unleashed for about 15 minutes. Then I took a shower. Then I made my blogger, then i posted, then i did pretty much nothing for a couple hours. Then my dad brought me lunch. I had the Steak nacho's from CARL's JR./GREEN BURRITO. Then I did pretty much nothing for a couple of hours. Then I went up to my brothers house to babysit my neice with my mom. Then I came home and rode at Biggums until dark. That was my day!

Like I said in my last post, I will now post the rules for Tyrone Biggums Raceway: 1.) If you crash, do not sue me! (you will have to sign a release form before you ride for the first time) 2.)Call 688-0502 during the week to inform me ahead of time that you will be riding. 3.)If you crash into a sprinkler and break it, please inform me and i will replace it before using it. 4.)Do NOT litter!! Also I forgot to tell you guys that it is open Friday-Sunday from 11:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

As the title says my new racetrack in my back yard called Tyrone Biggums Raceway is now open to ride bmx and mountain bikes on! Every other Sunday we will have the Red Balls National which is a race that has 4 different classes........begginer, intermediate,pro, and mini! (I will post the rules when I get back from my brothers) I hope to see you there

I just finished making my new mix cd that i can now sell for $3.00 each.......the songs in the cd are..... Out of Control-Hoobastank Downfall-Trust Company Fuck Authority-Pennywise Holiday In The Sun-Pennywise Yesterdays-Pennywise Hooch-Sum41 Over My Head (Better Off Dead)-Sum41 The Kids-Strung Out All I Want-The Offspring The Kids Arn't Alright-The Offspring Memory-Sugarcult Meant To Live-Switchfoot Push It-Static-X She Bangs-Ricky Martin Last Resort-Papa Roach The Sepearation Of The Church And Skate-NoFx

Sorry for not telling you guys, but just incase you're wondering, my motorcycle is a 2004 Honda CR85 Expert that has Renthal Fatbars and an FmF Turbinecore 2 spark arrestor. Also to let you know what my bmx bike is, it is a 2003 mettalic silver Free Agent-Eluder.

Alright.......since i have nothing else to do today......i'll do another reveiw. This time its on a game that i just recently got. MX Unleashed. It is probobally one of the best games i've played, and it is the best motorcycle game i've played. It has it all that you want in a game, from awsome music, to great graphics to very realistic game play. Look into buying this game!
I also wanted to let you guys know that i'm probobally going riding this weekend to the "Doc's." I'll tell you guys how it was!

If anybody out there is lookin into buying a new motorcycle movie........Travis and the Nitro circuis is what you should buy. It has everything in it. From Travis crashing the step-up at Castillo's Ranch......to his funny-ass cousin Special Greg......to a nine year old kid doing a 100 foot step-up on a ktm65!!This movie a amazing and halarious.........just wanted to let you guys know.
Hey everybody, this is my new site that is gonna be all about my dirtbikes, other peoples dirt bikes and other stuff like that..............ENJOY!!!
Like It says above.......I didn't go riding at the "Doc's", but instead went to the S.Y.V. River.......I'll tell you guys how it was later......peace!
